New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 128 not out off 94 balls, the fastest half-century in the match
India scored 410-4, their highest score in the tournament
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets with a slower ball to dismiss Aryan Dutt
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Rohit Sharma emphasized focusing on each game individually
India were favorites going into the match due to their strong performance
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's clinical performance
Netherlands skipper Scott Edwards highlighted their growth and future potential
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the last of the group stage
The result boosted India's confidence for the semi-finals
